item.title: Thread.sleep gains priority somehow...help!
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

I’m using a PI source.
I’m trying to manually teleport a player using this code :

c.startAnimation(1979); c.gfx0(392); try { Thread.sleep(1000); } catch (InterruptedException i) { } c.teleportToX = X; c.teleportToY = Y; c.heightLevel = Z; c.getPA().requestUpdates();
However , the sleep() method runs first , and then it reads the whole block of code in 1 go…

SO Here’s what it should do:

  1. start the anim

  2. start the gfx

  3. delay 1 sec

  4. teleport

INSTEAD it does this :

  1. delays the whole thing for 1sec from the start

  2. anim

  3. do the gfx

  4. teleport

How can I make it work the way it should?
